summary: Implements helper utilities for building and serializing the binary protocol messages required by the S3 SelectObjectContent API, including header, data, statistics, and termination messages, as well as simple parsing of SQLâ€‘like query strings. These functions are used by the Moto S3 mock to emulate AWS S3 Select behavior.
business_intent: Allow developers and test suites to mock S3 Select functionality locally, avoiding real AWS calls while providing realistic response formatting.
